statements: SELECT * FROM game_assets
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_type DESC
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_size FROM game_assets WHERE asset_size > 100 ORDER BY asset_id ASC
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_size FROM game_assets WHERE asset_size BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY asset_id DESC
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type='weapon' ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_size > 1000 AND asset_type='armor';
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM game_assets WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_size, created_at FROM game_assets WHERE asset_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_size, created_at FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type='potion' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Weapon';

SELECT delivery_id, d.asset_id, r.resource_name, d.delivery_status FROM delivery d JOIN resources r ON d.resource_id = r.resource_id;

SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM assets WHERE asset_type='Document' AND asset_size > 100;
SELECT resources.resource_name, delivery.delivery_status FROM resources INNER JOIN delivery ON resources.resource_id = delivery.resource_id;

SELECT assets.asset_name, resources.resource_name, delivery.delivery_status FROM assets INNER JOIN delivery ON assets.asset_id = delivery.asset_id INNER JOIN resources ON delivery.resource_id = resources.resource_id WHERE assets.asset_size < 500;
